R

Rank - Enum in checkersgame.Model.PieceComponents
 
remainingPieces(Colour) - Method in class checkersgame.Model.PiecesArray
Gets the total number of pieces a colour has on the board.
ReplayButtonsPanel - Class in checkersgame.View
 
ReplayButtonsPanel(ReplayGameController) - Constructor for class checkersgame.View.ReplayButtonsPanel
Create a new panel which will hold a button for moving to the next move during a game replay.
ReplayGameController - Class in checkersgame.Controller
 
ReplayGameController(MovesQueue, int) - Constructor for class checkersgame.Controller.ReplayGameController
Creates a new replay instance, similar to PlayableGameController, but without allowing the user to move, or creating a new database game entry.
ReplayMenuController - Class in checkersgame.Controller
 
ReplayMenuController(MenuController) - Constructor for class checkersgame.Controller.ReplayMenuController
Creates a new panel for displaying all game replays stored in the database.
ReplayMenuPanel - Class in checkersgame.View
 
ReplayMenuPanel(ReplayMenuController) - Constructor for class checkersgame.View.ReplayMenuPanel
Creates a new panel which will display the saved game replays.
replayPanel - Variable in class checkersgame.Controller.ReplayMenuController
